categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: Meela was the daughter of a local professor on Jandoon by the name of Oron. She was captured and handed back by Durrei, along with 10,000 credits to crimelord Mahk'khar, in exchange for the Kashi Mer talisman.

In the wake of retiring as Master Historian, Arhul Hextrophon took possession of the master database of ancient text compiled by Oron from Meela. Among the collection of creation myths that proved vital to Hextrophon's work.
